Neymar's message to Barcelona on Instagram:
"The life of an athlete is made by challenges. Some are given to us, some are fruits of our own decisions. Those decision are to keep the light that illuminated our career which is intense, but short. Barcelona was much more than a challenge. It was the dream of a child who played with those stars in video games. I arrived in Catalonia at 21 years of age, filled with challenges. I still remember my first days in Barcelona... I shared a dressing room with idols like Messi, Valdes, Xavi, Iniesta, Puyol, Pique, and Busquets and many others. I was waiting for my turn to play for the club that is 'mes que un club'. Barcelona is a nation that represents Catalonia. I had the honor to play with the best athlete I've seen in my life & I'm sure I won't see anyone like him while I'm alive. Leo Messi became my friend in and out the pitch. It was an honor to play with you. I made a trio with Messi and Suarez that made history, conquered everythig an athlete can conquer, lived unforgettable moments. I lived in a city (Barcelona) that's more than a city. It's a homeland. I love Barcelona and I love Catalonia, but an athlete needs challenges. And for the 2nd time in my life, I will contradict my father. Father, I understand and respect your opinion, but my decision is made and I ask you to support me like you always do. Barcelona and Catalonia will always be in my heart, but I need new challenges. I accepted PSG's proposition to try new achievements, and help the club win the titles its crowd wants. PSG showed me a daring career plan, and I feel ready to take on this challenge. I thank the wonderful blaugrana crowd, and everything learned with the great athletes that I shared the dressing room with. Now I feel in my heart that it's time to leave. PSG will be my home for the next years and I will work hard to honor all the trust put in my football. I'm counting on the support of all you who've been with me since 2009: fans, friends, professionals who are with me, and family. It's a very hard decision, but I made it with the maturity I accumulated throughout 25 years. Barcelona, gracies per tot. Paris, j'arrive. May God bless us and protect us."
